name: React Frontend Application PRD
description: Modern React web application with responsive design, state management, and API integration

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A modern web application built with React (Vite) providing responsive, interactive user interface with state management.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Component library, routing, forms, data tables, charts, search, pagination, modal dialogs

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: FCP < 1.5s, WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, mobile responsive, bundle < 300KB gzip

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: React 18+, Vite 5+, React Router 6+, Zustand, Axios, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
